name: TMM2
0:
”Alexa, play T. M. M. two”
”Alexa, launch T. M. M. two”
”Alexa, open T. M. M. two”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. m. m. two
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to TMM 2, the New & Classic Indie Alternative Music Service

To start, just say "Alexa, play TMM 2" or "Alexa, launch TMM 2" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
